1ecc06d9-59de-4b4a-87fa-24a36a14ac44.description: Over the course of 12 months, participants who have completed the Nike, Inc. DEI Leadership Acceleration Academy have developed foundational competencies and skills that enable them to solve dilemmas at the intersection of race and gender; use practical approaches gained to make equity-conscious leadership decisions for the well-being of all employees; and employ DE&I literacy to make the workplace more equitable, diverse, and inclusive.
1ecc06d9-59de-4b4a-87fa-24a36a14ac44.name: Nike, Inc. DEI Leadership Acceleration Academy

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Attend lectures, actively participate in course discussions, complete polls, complete in-session group work and activities.
Attend and complete all 12 program modules and/or recorded session lectures.

skills.name: Apply Concepts Of Diversity And Inclusion

120cbc03-8d5a-4c8c-b03d-7cb54261c466.description: Earners of the Kaiser Permanente Advanced Management Program Badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be high-performing leaders and to understand culture and the health care industry. Throughout the duration of the Advanced Management Program, participants have honed and applied skills related to strategic decision-making, personal leadership, managing change, and strategic alliances in health care.
120cbc03-8d5a-4c8c-b03d-7cb54261c466.name: Kaiser Permanente Advanced Management Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each module and learning activity associated with the Kaiser Permanente Advanced Management Program.

Participate in a team-based Capstone Project to conduct analysis and provide recommendations for key business areas within Kaiser Permanente, utilizing the knowledge, skills, and abilities from the Kaiser Permanente Advanced Management Program.

6955d67b-b916-4431-85e2-277805024ee1.description: Earners of the Food Industry Executive Program badge have learned and demonstrated the skills necessary to drive change, apply strategic innovation, foster teamwork and collaboration, and increase revenue within the food industry. Throughout this 4-day intensive program, participants have honed and applied skills related to leadership, strategic thinking, integrated marketing, industry disruption & evolution, power & influence, diversity & inclusion, and executive communication.
6955d67b-b916-4431-85e2-277805024ee1.name: Food Industry Executive Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete & participate fully in each program session associated with the Food Industry Executive Program

99821a93-e09c-454e-8a16-9d88d0c63ff3.description: Earners of the TransDigm Leadership Development Program Badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be high-performing leaders and to understand culture and competitive advantage. Throughout the duration of the Leadership Development Program, participants have honed and applied skills related to strategic decision-making, leadership, performance management, innovation, design thinking, and managing change. These focus areas have been reinforced through executive coaching.
99821a93-e09c-454e-8a16-9d88d0c63ff3.name: TransDigm Leadership Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each module and learning activity associated with the TransDigm Leadership Development Program.

Participate in team-based Action Learning Project to develop solutions to real business issues within TransDigm, utilizing the knowledge, skills, and abilities from the TransDigm Leadership Development Program, and present to TransDigm senior leadership.

765b0970-7abf-4e23-aed8-352d32621801.description: Earners of the Pacific Life Leadership Development Program Badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be high-performing innovation leaders within their organization and to understand culture and competitive advantage. Throughout the duration of the 4-month Leadership Development Program, participants have honed and applied skills related to leadership, strategic innovation, customer-centricity, decision-making, design thinking, and leading & managing change.
765b0970-7abf-4e23-aed8-352d32621801.name: Pacific Life Executive Leadership Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete all 9 modules of the Pacific Life ELDP.
Completion of the Belbin Team Assessment & Leadership 360 Assessment.

c72f3fb2-829c-4d9c-a9f0-a569b184ef8d.description: Earners of the Psychological Safety: Unlocking Your Team's Capabilities badge have developed foundational understanding with creating and fostering psychological safety to enable high team performance. They have competency in understanding the critical importance of psychological safety, ability to identify symptoms of unsafe teams, techniques needed to build psychological safety in one-on-one and groups, and created immediate actions to implement psychological safety on own team.
c72f3fb2-829c-4d9c-a9f0-a569b184ef8d.name: Psychological Safety: Unlocking Your Team's Capabilities

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Psychological Safety: Unlocking Your Team's Capabilities course.

d99e8c16-218f-41aa-888c-34764fdb93f3.description: Earners of the SoCalGas Strategic Leader Development Program Badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be effective leaders at SoCalGas. Throughout the duration of the 3-month Strategic Leader Development Program, participants have honed and applied skills related to strategic analysis, finance, values-based leadership, leading change, and executive communication. These focus areas have been reinforced through individual coaching.
d99e8c16-218f-41aa-888c-34764fdb93f3.name: SoCalGas Strategic Leader Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each module and learning activity associated with the SoCalGas Strategic Leader Development Program.

Participate in team-based Action Learning Project to develop solutions to key focus areas within SoCalGas, utilizing the knowledge, skills, and abilities from the SoCalGas Strategic Leader Development Program, and present to SoCalGas senior leadership.

ca894f3d-e222-4d1c-8351-9d0f8314de4b.description: Earners of the Understanding Finance and Accounting badge have developed foundational understanding of finance and accounting. They have foundational competency in skills such as reviewing balance sheets, financial and income statements, transaction and financial ratio analysis, accounting for operating assets, valuation, cash flow analysis, capital budgeting, and valuation analysis.
ca894f3d-e222-4d1c-8351-9d0f8314de4b.name: Understanding Finance and Accounting

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Understanding Finance and Accounting course

4b8c1dd6-1ae7-4f09-84de-7edaf6e45402.description: Earners of the Viasat Leadership Institute 2 badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to become strategic leaders within their organization. They also spent considerable time examining the financial perspective, as it relates to the strategic objectives of the firm. Throughout the duration of the program, participants have honed and applied skills related to strategic thinking, decision-making, financial valuation frameworks, and organizational culture.
4b8c1dd6-1ae7-4f09-84de-7edaf6e45402.name: Viasat Leadership Institute

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each module and learning activity associated with the Viasat Leadership Institute Program.
Participate in team-based Action Learning Project to develop solutions to key focus areas within Viasat Inc., and present to senior leadership.

62f60e00-7cf1-4eb0-a3ff-66ef102c3cd7.description: Earners of the SoCalGas Director Development Program Badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be effective Directors at SoCalGas. Throughout the duration of the 6-month Director Development Program, participants have honed and applied skills related to strategic analysis, financial analysis, harnessing culture, values-based leadership, and executive communication. These focus areas have been reinforced through executive coaching and mentoring.
62f60e00-7cf1-4eb0-a3ff-66ef102c3cd7.name: SoCalGas Director Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each module and learning activity associated with the SoCalGas Director Development Program
Develop and present an innovative change initiative utilizing the knowledge, skills, and abilities from the SoCalGas Director Development to SoCalGas senior leadership.

74414d11-6702-4460-9095-4f2e7cf722b4.description: Earners of the Wells Fargo Leading for Diversity, Equity & Inclusion badge have examined concepts of individual and organizational diversity, and the challenges of rolling out diversity initiatives at an organization. They learned about the context of bias, effective strategies toward equity, and approaches toward policy and practice implementation, as well as specific inclusive manager and people behaviors that promote a climate of inclusion.
74414d11-6702-4460-9095-4f2e7cf722b4.name: Wells Fargo Leading for Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Wells Fargo Leading for Diversity, Equity & Inclusion program.

69d89263-b2cb-4833-9067-7bf7ad626ce2.description: Earners of the Inclusive Leadership: Understanding Self to Lead Others badge have developed skills in utilizing self-identity to cultivate inclusion and sense of belonging within their organization. They have developed competency in utilizing inclusive leadership principles to managing an organization and cultivation of a culture of belonging, skills to develop more inclusive and equitable organizations, and practices to overcome barriers to diversity, equity and inclusion.
69d89263-b2cb-4833-9067-7bf7ad626ce2.name: Inclusive Leadership: Understanding Self to Lead Others

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Inclusive Leadership: Understanding Self to Lead Others course.

319e3f0e-95bd-471a-bc09-c40a759b8a39.description: Earners of the Purpose-Driven Leadership badge have developed the tools necessary for becoming a leader who leads with purpose. They have competency in identifying the purpose and principles that drive themselves as a leader, ability to articulate purpose to inspire others, practice key elements of storytelling, improve positioning within relationship networks to improve creativity, novel information and generate more influence, and strategies for solidifying bases of power as a leader.
319e3f0e-95bd-471a-bc09-c40a759b8a39.name: Purpose Driven Leadership

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Purpose Driven Leadership course.

f6dc287d-b53f-4357-b0c6-7df481c67f1d.description: Earners of the Agile Leadership: Activating Curiosity in Yourself and Others badge have developed skills to manage uncertainty and utilize curiosity toward becoming an agile leader. They have competency in connecting core values to curiosity-led behaviors, meta-skill for agility, and have learned curiosity led frameworks and models toward continuous innovation.
f6dc287d-b53f-4357-b0c6-7df481c67f1d.name: Agile Leadership: Activating Curiosity in Yourself and Others

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Agile Leadership: Activating Curiosity in Yourself and Others

7cebbd47-024a-46eb-980d-8b2d4cffe718.description: Earners of the Big Data and Managerial Decision-making badge have developed an understanding of big data, machine learning, AI, and data analytics, and know what these tools can do. They have competency as consumers of data analytics to facilitate communication with others, identify current and potential sources of data within their firm and their potential benefits, use experiments and predictive analytics to improve decision-making, and recognize good vs. bad data looks like in data science.
7cebbd47-024a-46eb-980d-8b2d4cffe718.name: Big Data and Managerial Decision-making

e87449be-e772-40ae-ac4d-f15e52148f3e.description: Earners of this badge represent the dedication and time spent contributing as an active member of the USC Marshall Executive Education Advisory Board.

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Active and contributing member to the USC Marshall Executive Education Advisory Board.

880c8f49-7940-409d-b458-ebffd14e2e6f.description: Earners of the Mindfulness Toward Humanistic Leadership badge have developed skills in utilizing mindfulness toward effective leadership. They have competency in how to use mindfulness to respond to adversities, understand the variety of mindfulness practices that can be used in everyday life, awareness of body and its intelligence, move toward skillful responses, balance with self-motions, healthier relationships with thoughts, and exhibit kindness to self and others.
880c8f49-7940-409d-b458-ebffd14e2e6f.name: Mindfulness Toward Humanistic Leadership

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Mindfulness Toward Humanistic Leadership.

aa7deacb-71ca-4aaf-9981-2973fdc30256.description: Earners of the Animal Legal Defense Fund Management Development badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be high-performance managers. Throughout the duration of the 8-week program, participants have honed and applied skills related to relationship intelligence, psychological safety, performance management, performance feedback & coaching, and developing high performing teams to their roles. These areas have been reinforced through real world practice sessions.
aa7deacb-71ca-4aaf-9981-2973fdc30256.name: Animal Legal Defense Fund Management Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each learning activity associated with the ALDF Management Development Program

09eb5c57-7c87-4910-ad1f-3a4f81e9859f.description: Earners of this badge have built the skills necessary to accelerate their team members' willingness and ability to speak freely and contribute fully in meetings. Through fostering psychologically safe environments, creating ground rules expectations, developing and leading with questions, and strategically using silence, participants have demonstrated competency by applying the learnings from this workshop directly into their professional environments.
09eb5c57-7c87-4910-ad1f-3a4f81e9859f.name: Getting My Team to Speak More in Meetings Workshop

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete each of the modules and activities included with the workshop.
Apply the knowledge, skills, and abilities within participant's professional environments and debrief the results.

f7884268-4969-4fd4-85a6-e9023a2a33cd.description: Earners of the Enterey Leadership Development Program badge have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be client-centered and focused leaders. Throughout the duration of the 4-month program, participants have honed and applied skills related to curiosity, design thinking, and creativity to their roles. These areas have been reinforced through real world practice sessions.
f7884268-4969-4fd4-85a6-e9023a2a33cd.name: Enterey Leadership Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each and learning activity associated with the Enterey Leadership Development.

1e0bfe2e-920e-46b9-b369-310137e18ed7.description: Earners of this badge have built the skills necessary to lead change within their organizations. Through framing and communicating the need for change, applying innovation diffusion, applying forces and removing friction elements, and strategically using nudges, participants have demonstrated competency by applying the learnings from this workshop directly into their professional environments.
1e0bfe2e-920e-46b9-b369-310137e18ed7.name: Leading a Change Initiative

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete each of the modules and activities included with the workshop.
Apply the knowledge, skills, and abilities related to leading change to a proposed change initiative within your own organization.

5244f256-2cbf-4f34-ae66-3d7f638c537e.description: Earners of the Digital Innovation: Enabling Organizational Agility badge have demonstrated the skills necessary to lead an organization's technology architecture to foster agility and innovate decision-making. Throughout the duration of this program, participants have gained skills necessary to decentralize and componentize organizational assets, couple assets for reusable business services, and implement enterprise resource planning for cross-functional information sharing.
5244f256-2cbf-4f34-ae66-3d7f638c537e.name: Digital Innovation: Enabling Organizational Agility

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete each of the 8 skill based modules associated with this program, demonstrating competency in applying the skills toward generated cases and real world applications.

cffa4a93-1002-4681-94ff-cb34871793a3.description: Enterey Leadership Develop Program badge earners for the Building Client Partnerships series have demonstrated the requisite skills necessary to be client-centered and attuned to the requirements for effective client partnerships. Through the program, participants developed the capacity to detect and act in relation to organizational actors based upon their role and organizational conditions. They have practiced and applied the skills of active listening, problem analysis, & problem solving.
cffa4a93-1002-4681-94ff-cb34871793a3.name: Enterey Leadership Development Program: Building Client Partnerships

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Participate in and complete each and learning activity associated with the Enterey Leadership Development.

017244a8-cb48-4340-a715-d866173e8ea8.description: Earners of the Family Business and Succession Planning badge have developed the tools necessary for navigating and managing the complexities of succession planning. They have competency in communicating effectively among generations, succession planning, managing wealth in investments outside of the family business, and an understanding of social impact.
017244a8-cb48-4340-a715-d866173e8ea8.name: Family Business and Succession Planning

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Family Business and Succession Planning program.

79749704-8a81-4372-b81d-5c197eb19b5b.description: Earners of the Leadership Development for Building High Performing Teams badge have developed the tools necessary for leading and developing teams. They have competency in establishing guidelines, utilizing talents, allocating personnel and assigning roles, building trust, establishing accountability, maintaining performance and team morale, and understanding the impact of organizational culture on a team’s effectiveness.
79749704-8a81-4372-b81d-5c197eb19b5b.name: Leadership Development for Building High Performing Teams

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete and participate fully in the Leadership Development for Building High Performing Teams program.

379f21bd-4f3b-4424-9a20-92d094ed231c.description: Earners of this badge have built the skills necessary to retain the employees of their organization. Through establishing shared working protocols through tenets of the platinum rule, applying skills and techniques to address employee burnout, building greater levels of project ownership with direct reports, and demonstrating flexible leadership, participants have demonstrated competency by applying the learnings from this workshop directly into their professional environments.
379f21bd-4f3b-4424-9a20-92d094ed231c.name: Retaining Your People

issuer.summary: issued by USC Marshall Executive Education

badge_template_activities.title: Complete each of the modules and activities included with the workshop.
Apply the knowledge, skills, and abilities within participant's professional environments and debrief the results.

15ba548e-cfa1-42c8-9e5e-cf5493050800.description: Participants in the Wellnenss Coaching: Empowering Leaders Program gain essential coaching skills allowing them to assist others move past thinking and action patterns that perpetuate burnout and increase personal and professional growth. Coaching leaders from this program have demonstrated requisite skills in cognitive reframing, building personal agency, increasing engagement, and assisting in achieving better workplace results.
15ba548e-cfa1-42c8-9e5e-cf5493050800.name: Wellness Coaching: Empowering Leaders
